Journey of an angel

ZeppDawg was born so long ago bro.


He grew up on the fringes of heaven. Always a punk. Always a funk-meistro. Always scorned by the hegemony of heaven.

The calling...

ZeppDawg knew he was different from the beginning. He began the quest to find an outlet that matched his style, and one day he found it...

The denial...

ZeppDawg's calling expanded after learning about distortion. Unfortunately distrotion is illegal in heaven, and after a long fought judicial battle he realized he must leave the heavens to pursue his passion.
